channel.title: Changing Starter
channel.description: How Do You Change Starter Set & Starter Packet? I've Been using the search button and lookin for a topic on it for about 2 1/2 hrs.

item.title: Changing Starter
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Ok, if your talking about your ::starter go into client.java and search

starter

after you find one with a bunch of additems switch the id’s or add more to the list save and compile

If your talking about the starter outfit go into player.java and search

unique

scroll down until you see something that says giving the player a unique look then edit the id’s

(if on a dodian/devolution/microzoft source search for the id’s in which you start with and edit them).

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Starter
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

uh i think you go to player.java and basically just scroll down a bit or search one of the ids in starter and change it

Read full topic
